settings.title: Settings
settings.logoutConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to logout? All servers and settings will be cleared.

biometric.unavailableMessage: Biometric authentication is not available on this device.
biometric.notEnrolledMessage: No biometric credentials are enrolled on this device.
biometric.enablePrompt: Authenticate to enable Face ID lock

home.noServerMessage: Please add a server in Settings to get started.

addServer.title: Add Server
addServer.name: Name
addServer.appleDescription: Uses Apple Foundation Models to run AI entirely on-device via CoreML. Requires iOS 26+ with Apple Intelligence support.

editServer.title: Edit Server
editServer.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this server? This action cannot be undone.

biometricLock.failedMessage:
There was an issue with your authentication attempt.
Please try again.
biometricLock.authFailed: Authentication failed. Tap to try again.

step1.title: Managing your Agents is easier than ever
step1.description: Lumiere gives you a beautiful mobile interface to interact with your AI agents on the go. Monitor conversations, send messages, and stay connected from anywhere.

step2.title: Full control with powerful features
step2.description: Manage multiple servers, switch between sessions, schedule tasks with cron jobs, and get real-time notifications. Everything you need to stay in command.

step3.title: Highly configurable for custom needs
step3.description: Connect to OpenClaw, Ollama, or Echo providers. Customize themes, set up deep link triggers, and tailor the experience to fit your workflow.
